localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Expand your skills as an artist with daily art challenges. Categories include drawing, photography, painting, and typography. The best way to improve is daily practice. Challenge yourself and your friends to create something new every day with Creact!
blogPost.body: Expand your skills as an artist with daily art challenges. Categories include drawing, photography, painting, and typography. The best way to improve is daily practice. Challenge yourself and your friends to create something new every day with Creact!
blogPost.title: Creact - Daily art & drawing challenges to improve your art skills
blogPost.author: Brian Hulme

localize.description: 通过每天的艺术挑战来扩展你作为一个艺术家的技能。类别包括绘画、摄影、绘画和排版。提高技能的最好方法就是每天练习。通过Creact！挑战你和你的朋友，每天创造新的东西。
localize.tagline: 每天的艺术和绘画挑战，提高你的艺术技能。

localize.description: 通過每天的藝術挑戰來擴展你作爲一個藝術家的技能。類別包括繪畫、攝影、繪畫和排版。提高技能的最好方法就是每天練習。通過Creact！挑戰你和你的朋友，每天創造新的東西。
localize.tagline: 每天的藝術和繪畫挑戰，提高你的藝術技能。

previous.excerpt: Agree is a shared voting app to help you come to a joint decision with friends and colleagues. Create and share polls, and simply swipe right to vote yes and left for no. Winning options pop up as a notification once everyone has voted.
previous.title: Agree - Polls with friends

localize.description: Agree是一款共享投票应用，帮助你与朋友和同事达成共同的决定。创建和分享投票，只需向右滑动投赞成票，向左滑动投反对票。一旦大家都投了票，获胜的选项就会以通知的形式弹出。
Agree是一款共享投票應用，幫助你與朋友和同事達成共同的決定。創建和分享投票，只需向右滑動投贊成票，向左滑動投反對票。一旦大家都投了票，獲勝的選項就會以通知的形式彈出。
